title: Lemongrass extract enhances productive performance, blood biomarkers, immunity, and gut health of broilers
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Amany A. El-Sahn, Eman A. Manaa, Amal M. EL-Barbary, Ayman M. Khalifah, Sahar Fayez, Asmaa S.A. Abdel-Daim, Ghadeer M. Albadrani, Mohamed M. Abdel-Daim, Mervat A. Abdel-Latif
